kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page. A Page is the Playwright equivalent to a tab. See `Browser, Context and Page` for more information about Page concept. Returns a stable identifier for the created page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://parodify.herokuapp.com/users/sign_in
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Wait for Element with selector: css=a[href$=sign_out]

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.
